violations.description: Ensure the contrast between foreground and background colors meets WCAG 2 AA minimum contrast ratio thresholds

nodes.failureSummary:
Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 3.15 (foreground color: #333333, background color: #ff0000, font size: 9.0pt (12px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1

Fix any of the following:
  Element has insufficient color contrast of 2.07 (foreground color: #333333, background color: #c80000, font size: 9.0pt (12px), font weight: normal). Expected contrast ratio of 4.5:1
